title: Jacket
description: large jacket with short sleeves; black pounded indigo with purple, white and pink trim; embroidery of human forms, birds and flowers in bands down front, across shoulders and on sleeves; black velvet surrounds neck opening with stand up collar; some applique and metal disks front and back; lined with black pounded indigo; cuffs; front longer than back
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
